name: Samurai Shiba
description:
Samurai Shiba

“Samurai Shiba” is a 2D pixel platform action game. You playing as a Shiba Samurai, waking from a old temple, lost all ur memory, traveling in a world of dangerous animal enemys, defeating them to get new abilities and find back your memory.

Controls:
  1. Press "A" "D" to move
  2. Press "J" to use light attack
  3. Press "K" to use heavy attack
  4. Press "Shift" to dodge
  5. Press "Space Bar" to jump
Steps:
  1. Download the 7z file
  2. Unzip the file
  3. Have fun with Samurai Shiba !
